main event: Four military men observed two reddish-bronze objects hovering while they were being briefed on the ground.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The objects were described as pacing, descending, and ascending., This incident took place in the presence of several military personnel., The reported sighting was investigated and suggested to possibly be balloon-related., A later observation noted similar phenomena occurred during military night photo training operations in the same area.
witness description: military personnel involved in a briefing
